parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From kata and ago; to lead down; specially, to moor a vessel.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Syracuse. Plural of uncertain derivation; Syracuse, the capital of Sicily.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: (a) I remain, tarry, (b) I remain in, persist in. From epi and meno; to stay over, i.e. Remain.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
